page.title: 06THE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school takes children from the ages of 4 to 11.When they leave they nearly all go by bus to the comprehensive school at Huntington, which is 4 miles from here. Every child spends two years in each of the four classes. Mrs Rawkins has been here 15 years,she takes the Reception class. Miss McCartney is the newest teacher she takes the Infants. Mr Faunt is the Headmaster, he takes the Lower Juniors.He has been here 6 years. Mr Stone takes our class he has been here 11 years . There are 110 children in the school,which was built in 1976 replacing one built in 1860.
